title.narrative: Implementing and Financing Nature-based Solutions for Resilience

description.narrative: The aim is to produce a user-friendly technical guide (‘the guide’) with key considerations for project formulation, funding and delivery of NbS. The guide will be composed of a toolkit and case studies (mainly from low- and middle-income countries). The target audience is primarily local and national governments and implementing actors working in the global south. The guide will also be useful for private sector investors and financial institutions, UN agencies, INGOs and consultants working on delivering NbS.
